name: 2942: UMTPBSES
description:
or UMTPBSES for short... or just 2942. A College Assigment made with Unity

2942 is a scrolling shooter set in a dystopian future, where you take control of a military space ship whose Squad got destroyed by aliens. As the only survivor left, you will need to endure the massive waves of enemies in order to reach a safety zone and return to your HQ. That won't be easy, so good luck soldier...

Extra Features:
  • If you feel the level is difficult, press 1 to get free upgrades! (Up to 2 at the same time)

The name was not my idea.
